text: Angelos Bible College was an unaccredited Bible college in Portsmouth, Virginia. The college was founded by Calvary Evangelical Baptist Church and was a member of Association of Christian Schools International. Classes were held in the church's facilities. The college graduated its first class in 2001. == References == == External links == * AngelosBibleCollege.org former official website from Archive.org Category:Unaccredited Christian universities and colleges in the United States Category:Baptist Christianity in Virginia Category:Baptist universities and colleges in the United States Category:Educational institutions established in 1984 Category:Defunct private universities and colleges in Virginia Category:1984 establishments in Virginia Category:Educational institutions disestablished in 2010 Category:2010 disestablishments in Virginia Category:Education in Portsmouth, Virginia Category:Bible colleges
title: Angelos Bible College
